segments.text: Peering in, the kitchen appears serene with daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a lovely garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman dries a plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, the sink is overflowing profusely!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, forming a lake on the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids take advantage, going for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I fear for their safety on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman needs to notice now.
segments.speaker: PAR
